data.title: NA Digest, V. 04, # 39
data.text:
NA Digest Saturday, September 25, 2004 Volume 04 : Issue 39

Today's Editor:

Cleve Moler

The MathWorks, Inc.

moler@mathworks.com

Today's Topics: Charles William Clenshaw Gutknecht 60th Birthday Honorary Doctorate for Lennart Ljung Change of Address for Robert G. Owens Term Document Generator for MATLAB OOPIC Pro, Particle-in-cell Code Global Optimization for C++ Report on 13th Scottish Computational Mathematics Symposium Report on PARA'04 in Lyngby, Denmark Special Issue to Honor Thomas Kailath Special Session on Dynamical and Numerical Aspects of Neural Computing Nominations for the Germund Dahlquist Prize Nominations for the Jurgen Moser Lecture Nominations for the J. D. Crawford Prize New Series Editors and Recent titles in the Numerical Mathematics Copper Mountain Multigrid Conference Conference in Germany on PDE Methods in Computer Vision Conference at Courant Institute on Domain Decomposition Methods Conference in Tunisia on Trends in Applied Mathematics Workshop in Portugal on PDE Constrained Optimization Workshop in Helsinki on Computational Problems in Physics Workshop at Hertfordshire on Automatic Differentiation Short Course at Huddersfield on Reliable Scientific Computing Faculty Position at Laurier University, Waterloo, Canada Faculty Position at West Virginia University Faculty Position at Arizona State University Faculty Positions at Colorado State University Faculty Position at the University of British Columbia Staff Position at the University of Bristol Goldstine Memorial Postdoctoral Fellowship at IBM Yorktown Postdoctoral Position at IST, Lisbon Contents, Reliable Computing Contents, Mathematical Modelling and Analysis
